error_addresses_general._description: The error message to display when there is an error getting prospect addresses.

error_general._description: The error message to display when there is an unknown error using the application.
error_general.message: FROG is experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later. {0}

error_search_general._description: The error message to display when there is an error returning search results.

error_search_searchlist_nocountryorphone.message: Your database is not set up to search by Country/Phone number. For assistance, contact your database administrator.

error_url.message: An error occurred loading this page.  If you accessed this page from a bookmark, the bookmarked URL may no longer be valid.

name_format._description: The name format for a person. The {0} token is the first name and the {1} token is the key name. If no first name exists, the key name will be used by itself

name_format_class._description: The custom name format for a person. The {0} token is the name, then class of. If no class of exists, the name will be used by itself
